document_data.name: Baykon the Bard
document_data.mainbody:
'''Baykon the Bard''' was a person in the [[Utter East]]. 

Regarding the [[Bloodforge Wars]] ([[648 DR|648]]–[[657 DR]]), Baykon the Bard remarked "With a prudent strategy, [[Great Mage (Bloodforge)|the Great Mage]] creates more opportunities than he finds." and "Even a blind Mage can see opportunity if he looks close enough".
